sen.j: 特芳の死後は西源院・龍安寺の住持を経て妙心寺の住持となったが、晩年は霊雲院を開創してそこに住した。
sen.e: After Tokuho's death, Daikyu became the chief priest of Saigenin and Ryoanji temples before eventually becoming chief priest of Myoshinji temple; in his later years, he founded Ryounin temple and took up residence there.
